name: Lily Franky
summary: Lily Franky. Actor: Shoplifters. Lily Franky was born on 4 November 1963 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor and writer, known for Shoplifters (2018), Like Father, Like Son (2013) and The Devil's Path (2013).
